short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds FanBuzz integration into the ESPN Fantasy clubhouse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access fast break-breaking player news from FanBuzz directly from your ESPN fantasy clubhouse. Once the app is installed, FanBuzz icons will appear on both your fantasy roster page and on the free agency page.
